short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chat colours and badges from on-screen chat for DeadFred including live notifications!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to view chat name colours as Fred does during the stream. Also with added live notifications for when he goes live!

If you like the extension, you can Buy Me a Coffee
